definition: to leap up/(coll.) to gush out/to spurt out
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]

sentences.english: Yet sales at film festivals this year have been brisk.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在今年的電影節上，獨立電影銷量又一度躥升。

sentences.english: Navistar's shares surged 41% in a single day on the news.
sentences.chinese: 這條消息讓航星在一天內躥升了41%。
